response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. Given your expertise and the value you place on this product, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your portfolio.

The product offers a multitude of benefits and advantages that align perfectly with your needs and goals. Considering its immense potential impact, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer represents a fantastic opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. It also includes exclusive access to future updates and enhancements, ensuring that your investment remains relevant and valuable over time.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information or arrange a demonstration to help you understand its full capabilities and benefits.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
